patthana1.14:8.1: Parittārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.14:8.2: parittārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhā.
patthana1.14:8.5: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe parittārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhā. #1
patthana1.14:9.1: Mahaggatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.14:9.2: mahaggatārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhā.
patthana1.14:10.1: Appamāṇārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.14:10.2: appamāṇārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhā. #1
patthana1.14:12.1: Parittārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā …
patthana1.14:15.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana1.14:20.1: Parittārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.14:20.2: ahetukaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhā.
patthana1.14:20.5: Ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe parittārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhā, vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana1.14:21.1: Mahaggatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.14:21.2: ahetukaṃ mahaggatārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhā, vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana1.14:22.1: Appamāṇārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.14:22.2: ahetukaṃ appamāṇārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhā. #1
patthana1.14:24.1: Parittārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.14:24.2: parittārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhā.
patthana1.14:25.1: Mahaggatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.14:25.2: mahaggatārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhā.
patthana1.14:26.1: Appamāṇārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.14:26.2: appamāṇārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhā. #1
patthana1.14:28.1: Parittārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—
patthana1.14:28.2: arūpe parittārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe …
patthana1.14:29.1: Mahaggatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—
patthana1.14:29.2: arūpe mahaggatārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhā.
patthana1.14:30.1: Appamāṇārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—
patthana1.14:30.2: arūpe appamāṇārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhā.
patthana1.14:32.1: Parittārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana1.14:33.1: Mahaggatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana1.14:34.1: Appamāṇārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana1.14:36.1: Parittārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā (paṭisandhi natthi) …
patthana1.14:36.3: pañcaviññāṇasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhā …
patthana1.14:36.7: ahetukaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhā;
patthana1.14:37.1: Mahaggatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati namaggapaccayā—
patthana1.14:37.2: ahetukaṃ mahaggatārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhā. #1
patthana1.14:38.1: Appamāṇārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati namaggapaccayā—
patthana1.14:38.2: ahetukaṃ appamāṇārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhā. #1
patthana1.14:40.1: Parittārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—
patthana1.14:40.2: arūpe parittārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe …. #1
patthana1.14:41.1: Mahaggatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—
patthana1.14:41.2: arūpe mahaggatārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe …. #1
patthana1.14:42.1: Appamāṇārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—
patthana1.14:42.2: arūpe appamāṇārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhā. #1
patthana1.14:45.1: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … napurejāte tīṇi, napacchājāte tīṇi, naāsevane tīṇi, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke tīṇi, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi.
patthana1.14:48.1: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā tīṇi, napurejāte tīṇi, napacchājāte tīṇi, naāsevane tīṇi, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi.
patthana1.14:52.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte tīṇi, āsevane dve, kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge dve, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā tīṇi, natthiyā tīṇi, vigate tīṇi, avigate tīṇi.
patthana1.14:60.1: Parittārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.14:60.2: parittārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:60.3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe parittārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.14:61.1: Mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.14:61.2: mahaggatārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:62.1: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo appamāṇārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.14:62.2: appamāṇārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.14:64.1: Parittārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.14:64.2: dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, ariyā parittārammaṇe pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.14:64.3: Parittārammaṇe paritte khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha parittārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.14:64.7: Parittārammaṇā parittā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.14:65.1: Parittārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.14:65.2: dibbaṃ cakkhuṃ paccavekkhati, dibbaṃ sotadhātuṃ paccavekkhati, parittārammaṇaṃ iddhividhañāṇaṃ paccavekkhati, cetopariyañāṇaṃ … pe …
patthana1.14:65.9: Parittārammaṇe mahaggate khandhe aniccato … pe … vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha mahaggatārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.14:65.15: Parittārammaṇā mahaggatā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.14:66.1: Mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.14:66.2: viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ paccavekkhati, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ paccavekkhati, mahaggatārammaṇaṃ iddhividhañāṇaṃ paccavekkhati, cetopariyañāṇaṃ … pe …
patthana1.14:66.9: Mahaggatārammaṇe mahaggate khandhe aniccato … pe … vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha mahaggatārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.14:66.15: Mahaggatārammaṇā mahaggatā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.14:67.1: Mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.14:67.4: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanapaccavekkhaṇaṃ paccavekkhati, dibbacakkhupaccavekkhaṇaṃ paccavekkhati, dibbasotadhātupaccavekkhaṇaṃ paccavekkhati, iddhividhañāṇapaccavekkhaṇaṃ … pe …
patthana1.14:67.12: anāgataṃsañāṇapaccavekkhaṇaṃ paccavekkhati, ariyā mahaggatārammaṇe pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.14:67.13: Mahaggatārammaṇe paritte khandhe aniccato … pe … vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha parittārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.14:67.19: Mahaggatārammaṇā parittā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.14:68.1: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo appamāṇārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.14:68.2: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.14:68.4: Appamāṇārammaṇā appamāṇā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.14:69.1: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.14:69.2: ariyā gotrabhuṃ paccavekkhanti, vodānaṃ paccavekkhanti, maggapaccavekkhaṇaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalapaccavekkhaṇaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānapaccavekkhaṇaṃ paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.14:69.3: Appamāṇārammaṇe paritte khandhe aniccato … pe … vipassati, cetopariyañāṇena appamāṇārammaṇaparittacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti.
patthana1.14:69.6: Appamāṇārammaṇā parittā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.14:70.1: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.14:70.2: ariyā appamāṇārammaṇaṃ cetopariyañāṇaṃ paccavekkhanti, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ paccavekkhanti, anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.14:70.4: Appamāṇārammaṇaṃ mahaggatā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.14:72.1: Parittārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.14:72.4: dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, parittārammaṇe paritte khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā parittārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.14:73.1: Parittārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:73.3: dibbaṃ cakkhuṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, dibbaṃ sotadhātuṃ … pe …
patthana1.14:73.14: Parittārammaṇe mahaggate khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā mahaggatārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. #2
patthana1.14:74.1: Mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.14:74.4: viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ … pe …
patthana1.14:74.15: Mahaggatārammaṇe mahaggate khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā mahaggatārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.14:75.1: Mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:75.6: Mahaggatārammaṇe paritte khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā parittārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. #2
patthana1.14:76.1: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo appamāṇārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.14:76.4: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.14:77.1: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:77.3: sekkhā gotrabhuṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, vodānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, maggapaccavekkhaṇaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, phalapaccavekkhaṇaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānapaccavekkhaṇaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti. #2
patthana1.14:78.1: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:78.3: sekkhā appamāṇārammaṇaṃ cetopariyañāṇaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.14:80.1: Parittārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.14:80.2: purimā purimā parittārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ parittārammaṇānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.14:81.1: Parittārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.14:81.2: parittārammaṇaṃ cuticittaṃ mahaggatārammaṇassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:81.3: Parittārammaṇaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ mahaggatārammaṇāya āvajjanāya anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:81.4: Parittārammaṇā khandhā mahaggatārammaṇassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.14:82.1: Parittārammaṇo dhammo appamāṇārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.14:82.2: parittārammaṇaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ appamāṇārammaṇāya āvajjanāya anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:83.1: Mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.14:83.2: purimā purimā mahaggatārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ mahaggatārammaṇānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.14:84.1: Mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.14:84.2: mahaggatārammaṇaṃ cuticittaṃ parittārammaṇassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:84.3: Mahaggatārammaṇaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ parittārammaṇāya āvajjanāya anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:84.4: Mahaggatārammaṇā khandhā parittārammaṇassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.14:85.1: Mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo appamāṇārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.14:85.2: mahaggatārammaṇaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ appamāṇārammaṇāya āvajjanāya anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:85.6: nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.14:86.1: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo appamāṇārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.14:86.2: purimā purimā appamāṇārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ appamāṇārammaṇānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:87.1: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.14:88.1: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.14:90.1: Parittārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:92.1: Parittārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nissayapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana1.14:94.1: Parittārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.14:94.5: parittārammaṇaṃ saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ … pe …
patthana1.14:94.13: samāpattiṃ uppādeti, mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti.
patthana1.14:94.23: kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ … pe …

patthana1.14:116.7: atthipaccayena paccayo … natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccaya …
patthana1.14:119.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā satta, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane pañca, kamme pañca, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye jhāne magge sampayutte atthiyā tīṇi, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate tīṇi.
patthana1.14:122.1: Parittārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #1

patthana1.14:130.1: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.14:134.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare nava, nasamanantare nava, nasahajāte nava, naaññamaññe nava, nanissaye nava, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava … pe … namagge nava, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte nava, noatthiyā nava, nonatthiyā nava, novigate nava, noavigate nava.
patthana1.14:138.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare naupanissaye napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane tīṇi … pe … namagge navippayutte nonatthiyā novigate tīṇi.
patthana1.14:142.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā satta, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane pañca, kamme pañca, vipāke tīṇi … pe … sampayutte tīṇi, atthiyā tīṇi, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate tīṇi.
